scripts.lint: eslint -c .eslintrc.json services/bot services/nsfw scripts/ && eslint -c .eslintrc.web.json services/landing services/dashboard/src
scripts.lint:fix: eslint -c .eslintrc.json services/bot services/nsfw scripts/ --fix && eslint -c .eslintrc.web.json services/landing services/dashboard --fix
scripts.dev:start: cd docker/compose && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs --follow bot nsfw
scripts.dev:db: cd docker/compose && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build db
scripts.dev:down: cd docker/compose && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.dev:logs: cd docker/compose && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f bot nsfw
scripts.prod:start: cd docker/compose && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build
scripts.prod:down: cd docker/compose && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down
scripts.prod:logs: cd docker/compose && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml logs -f bot nsfw
